name: Guild 3 Software
tag_list: software, craftsmanship, architecture, agile, lean, scrum
overview:
Guild 3 is a custom software development company founded on the core values of Integrity, Craftsmanship, Agility, and Community. Their simple mission is to deliver valuable and well crafted software to their customers.

Guild 3 founders were brought together by mutual professional respect and a shared vision of changing the poor state of the software development craft. The result is an organization dedicated to delivering premium custom software created with care.

Guild 3 offer’s their clients a unique professional services experience. Their craftsmen are senior software professionals committed to delivering high quality software solutions on the Microsoft .NET platform. If you have an idea you would like to turn into reality, a software project that needs help, or a need to have software developed well, contact them for a discussion.
